greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = exp(3) * Sum_{k>=0} (-3)^k*k^n/k!.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..571
mathematica: nmax = 25; CoefficientList[Series[Sum[(-3)^j x^j/Product[(1 - k x), {k, 1, j}] , {j, 0, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x]
nmax = 25; CoefficientList[Series[Exp[3 (1 - Exp[x])], {x, 0, nmax}], x] Range[0, nmax]!
program: (MAGMA) [1] cat [(&+[((-3)^k*StirlingSecond(m, k)):k in [0..m]]):m in [1..25]]; // _Marius A. Burtea_, Jul 27 2019
results.author: _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Jul 11 2019
